author: cbs8
title: Oceanco at the 2015 Fort Lauderdale International Boat Show - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8
text:
Information contained on this page is provided by an independent third-party content provider. WorldNow and this Station make no warranties or representations in connection therewith. If you have any questions or comments about this page please contact pressreleases@worldnow.com .
SOURCE Oceanco
ALBLASSERDAM, The Netherlands , October 13, 2015 /PRNewswire/ --
Oceanco is pleased to again be attending the Fort Lauderdale International Boat Show from November 5 to 9 at stand #10 at the "Superyacht Life Pavilion," (formerly known as the SYBAss Pavilion) close to the Bahia Mar Yachting Center.
(Photo: http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20151013/276303 )
Several spectacular scale models of our most recent projects will be on display at our stand. Two 105-meters/344.5-footers - the recently unveiled Philippe Briand -designed Acquaintance, which is the largest Vitruvius to date and the impressive Tim Heywood -designed Dana. We will also be showing the new 107m/351ft Ken Freivokh -designed Stiletto - all three of these projects are from designers with whom we are building new relationships and forging new design territories.
Also, from designers with whom we have launched previous Oceanco's, we will showcase the Espen Øino 90m/295.3ft Yasmin and the 109m/357ft Nuvolari Lenard-designed Bravo, which is based on Oceanco's new LIFE design philosophy.
Together with the above mentioned projects the Oceanco team is delighted to be presenting a full range of our 80m-140m projects.
We look forward to seeing you at this year's show and to sharing more news with you.
http://www.oceancoyacht.com
